title: Mobile-Based English Phoneme Awareness and Pronunciation Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic elementary English vocabulary and pronunciation knowledge
context.additional_context: Development and application of English phoneme training programs accessible in smartphone environments for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can improve pseudoword recognition accuracy for five English phonemes by 20%.
Learners can achieve ≥80% of daily phoneme training goals by applying self-regulated learning strategies via a mobile app.
Learners can explain the correlation between right middle temporal gyrus (RMTG) activation and test scores by comparing pre- and post-training pronunciation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
